python.title: what_i_do.py
python.description: Hallo ! Ola ! Namaste! Hi! I am Aditya , I love building things, it gives me the ability of a wizard , but instead of a cool wand I have a keyboard(its keychrone K2). I have been programming since the age of 14,and still going on...

js.title: why_frontend.js
js.description: Because I love make new designs, but also because I think we can make this web more interactive , more interesting , more liveable ... 🕷️

java.title: now_where.java
java.description: To the infinity and beyond. Well, I want to learn machine learning in my university and also contribute in that field. Nevertheless, frontend web development will always be my love ❤️
